TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi NavigationWindow extends System.Windows.Window implements class System.Windows.Markup.IUriContext
Public Class NavigationWindow Inherits Window Implements IUriContext
public ref class NavigationWindow : System::Windows::Window, System::Windows::Markup::IUriContext

summary.span: 表示支持内容导航的窗口。

span.span: Represents a window that supports content navigation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 派生自并能够导航到并显示内容对其进行扩展。 derives from and extends it with the ability to navigate to and display content. 内容可以是任何.NET Framework 对象或 HTML 文件。Content can be any .NET Framework object or HTML file. 通常，但是，对象是以导航的包内容的首选的方法。In general, however, a object is the preferred way to package content for navigation. 通过设置情况下，内容可以导航到的所需内容的 uri 的属性。Content can be navigated to by setting the property with the URI for the desired content. 此外，内容可以导航到使用的以下重载之一方法：Additionally, content can be navigated to by using one of the following overloads of the method: - - 通过 URI，导航到内容将返回包含内容的对象。When content is navigated to by URI, will return an object that contains the content. > [!NOTE] > 通过 URI 导航还支持导航到内容片段。Navigation by URI also supports navigation to a content fragment. 请参阅 。See . 或者，内容可以导航到使用之一接受对象的方法重载：Alternatively, content can be navigated to by using one of the method overloads that accepts an object: - - 导航的生存期可以跟踪通过以下事件：The lifetime of a navigation can be tracked through the following events: - - - - - - - 。. 并非所有事件都引发发生导航; 每次（取消、 已停止，或失败），将由导航发生 （内容或内容片段） 和如何完成导航的类型确定的一套引发的事件。Not all events are raised each time that a navigation occurs; the set of events that are raised is determined by the type of navigation that occurs (content or content fragment) and how the navigation completes (canceled, stopped, or failed). 下图说明了这些事件的激发顺序的序列：The following figure illustrates the sequence in which these events will fire: ![页面导航流程图](~/add/media/navigationoverviewfigure11.png "页面导航流程图")![Page navigation flow chart](~/add/media/navigationoverviewfigure11.png "Page navigation flow chart") 期间或之后导航窗格中，提供信息，其中包括要导航到内容的 URI 导航目标的内容 ()，当前内容的 URI ()，并包含的对象导航到的内容 ()。During or after a navigation, provides information about the content that is being navigated to, including the URI of the content being navigated to (), the URI of the current content (), and an object that contains the content that was navigated to (). 在内容导航到时,导航历史记录中记录为条目的导航。When content is navigated to, records the navigation as an entry in navigation history. 添加一个条目后退导航历史记录，新导航时，通过调用方法，或通过导航到前进导航历史记录中的项通过调用。An entry is added to back navigation history when either a new navigation occurs, by calling the method, or by navigating to an entry in forward navigation history, by calling . 条目添加到前进导航历史记录上，通过导航到条目后退导航历史记录，通过调用。An entry is added to forward navigation history by navigating to an entry in back navigation history, by calling . 和报告中是否有条目向后和向前导航历史记录，分别。 and report whether there are entries in backward and forward navigation history, respectively. 第一次一段的内容导航到另一段内容，从会自动显示导航用户界面，允许用户向后导航，并通过导航历史记录将转发。The first time that one piece of content is navigated to from another piece of content, automatically displays a navigation UI that allows users to navigate back and forwards through navigation history. 你可以配置导航 UI 会在显示时通过设置属性。You can configure when the navigation UI is shown by setting the property. 最新条目后退导航历史记录可能会通过调用。The most recent entry in back navigation history can be removed by calling . 不导航历史记录中存储内容的对象的实例。 does not store an instance of a content object in navigation history. 相反，创建使用导航历史记录导航到每次的内容对象的新实例。Instead, creates a new instance of the content object each time it is navigated to by using navigation history. 此行为旨在时较大数字和大片的内容要导航到避免过多的内存消耗。This behavior is designed to avoid excessive memory consumption when large numbers and large pieces of content are being navigated to. 因此，内容的状态将不会保留从一个导航到下一步。Consequently, the state of the content is not remembered from one navigation to the next. 但是，WPF 提供了几种方法，使您可以导航历史记录中存储的一条的一段内容的状态。However, WPF provides several techniques by which you can store a piece of state for a piece of content in navigation history. 使用，您还可以保留多个集的单个页面实例的状态。Using , you can also remember multiple sets of state for a single page instance. 是在 WPF 中，另一个执行的两个导航器之一。 is one of two navigators in WPF, the other being . 实质上，导航器是一个类支持导航和导航历史记录。Essentially, navigator is a class supports navigation and navigation history. 您可以看到，[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xbap#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xbapsharpplural-md.md)]使用[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ie7](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ie7-md.md)]作为导航器，以提供集成的用户体验。Visually, [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xbap#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xbapsharpplural-md.md)] use [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ie7](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ie7-md.md)] as a navigator, to provide an integrated user experience. 但是，[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xbap#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xbapsharpplural-md.md)]实际使用像导航;属性[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xbap](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xbap-md.md)]中运行[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ie7](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ie7-md.md)]将返回到引用，和由导航历史记录由导航历史记录与集成[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ie7](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ie7-md.md)]。However, [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xbap#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xbapsharpplural-md.md)] actually use as the navigator; the property of an [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xbap](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xbap-md.md)] running in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ie7](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ie7-md.md)] will return a reference to the , and the navigation history that is managed by the is integrated with the navigation history that is managed by [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ie7](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ie7-md.md)]. **内容模型：** 是，这意味着，可以包含如文本、 图像或面板的内容。**Content Model:** is a , which means that can contain content such as text, images, or panels. 此外，是根元素，因此，不能是另一个元素的内容的一部分。Also, is a root element and, consequently, cannot be part of another element's content. 有关的内容模型的详细信息，请参阅[WPF 内容模型](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/wpf-content-model.md)。For more information about the content model for , see [WPF Content Model](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/wpf-content-model.md). ## 自定义 NavigationWindow 控件Customizing the NavigationWindow Control 若要将相同的属性设置应用于多个控件，使用属性。To apply the same property settings to multiple controls, use the property. 你可以修改默认提供独特外观的控件。You can modify the default to give the control a unique appearance. 有关创建，请参阅[通过创建 ControlTemplate 自定义现有的控件的外观](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md)。For more information about creating a , see [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md). 若要查看的部件和特定于状态，请参阅[NavigationWindow 样式和模板](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/navigationwindow-styles-and-templates.md)。To see the parts and states that are specific to the , see [NavigationWindow Styles and Templates](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/navigationwindow-styles-and-templates.md). 对于此控件的依赖项属性可能由控件的默认样式设置。Dependency properties for this control might be set by the control’s default style. 如果属性设置的默认样式，该属性可能会更改从其默认值，如果控件出现在应用程序中。If a property is set by a default style, the property might change from its default value when the control appears in the application. 桌面主题用应用程序运行时确定的默认样式。The default style is determined by which desktop theme is used when the application is running. 有关详细信息，请参阅[默认 WPF 主题](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252)。For more information, see [Default WPF Themes](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252). > [!NOTE] > 设置 visual 属性会仅造成影响该属性是否都存在于控件的默认模板，并通过设置。Setting a visual property will only have an effect if that property is both present in control's default template and is set by using a . 可以在的"更改 Visual 结构的控件"一节中找到的可视属性列表[通过创建 ControlTemplate 自定义现有的控件的外观](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md)。You can find a list of visual properties in the "Changing the Visual Structure of a Control" section in [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何创建一个 。The following example shows how to create a . MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool SandboxExternalContent { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示 是否在一个部分信任的安全沙盒（具有默认 Internet 区域权限集）内隔离外部[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] 内容。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether a isolates external [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] content within a partial trust security sandbox (with default Internet zone permission set).

value.span: 如果在一个部分信任的安全沙盒中隔离内容，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if content is isolated within a partial trust security sandbox; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 外部内容是[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]未附随一个应用程序作为资源文件或内容文件的内容 (有关详细信息，请参阅[WPF 应用程序资源、 内容和数据文件](~/docs/framework/wpf/app-development/wpf-application-resource-content-and-data-files.md))。External content is [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] content that is not included with an application as either a resource file or a content file (for more information, see [WPF Application Resource, Content, and Data Files](~/docs/framework/wpf/app-development/wpf-application-resource-content-and-data-files.md)). 当为 true，并且内容是外部[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]文件时，内容加载到仅限于默认值的部分信任安全沙盒 Internet 区域权限集。When is true, and the content of the is an external [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] file, the content is loaded into a partial trust security sandbox that is limited to the default Internet zone permission set. 此外，外部内容都加载到单独的进程中。Additionally, the external content is loaded into a separate process. 因此，外部的内容将被隔离，无应用程序范围内的资源，例如资源字典的访问权限 (有关详细信息，请参阅)。Consequently, the external content becomes isolated and does not have access to application-scope resources, such as resource dictionaries (for more information, see ). > [!NOTE] > 包含外部的内容仅当属性设置为[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)]为外部[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]文件。 contains external content only when the property is set to the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] for an external [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] file. 使用提供的内容属性被视为内部内容，并随后，不会被隔离。 content that is provided using the property is considered internal content and, subsequently, is not isolated. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None|

exception.span: 当应用程序在部分信任的环境中执行时，将设置 。

span.span: is set when an application is executing in partial trust.

Public Overrides Function ShouldSerializeContent () As Boolean

summary.span: 指示是否应保持 属性。

span.span: Indicates whether the property should be persisted.

returns.span: 如果属性值已更改，不再是默认值，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the property value has changed from its default; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 这`ShouldSerialize`提供方法，因为属性不具有简单的默认值。This `ShouldSerialize` method is provided because the property does not have a simple default value. 此方法指示属性是否已从其默认值。This method indicates whether the property has changed from its default value. 如果你也正在开发的设计器通常调用此方法或开发你自己的控件包含。You typically call this method if you are either developing a designer for the or developing your own control incorporating the .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool ShowsNavigationUI { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示 是否显示其导航 UI。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether a shows its navigation UI.

value.span: 如果显示的导航用户界面;否则为。

span.span: if the navigation UI is displayed; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要向后帮助和前进导航窗格中，自动显示导航用户界面。To aid backward and forward navigation, automatically displays a navigation UI. 无论发生了导航，将显示的导航用户界面。The navigation UI is displayed whether or not navigation has occurred. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None|

summary.span: 获取或设置当前内容的 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)]，或当前正在导航到的新内容的 URI。

span.span: Gets or sets the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] of the current content, or the URI of new content that is currently being navigated to.

value.span: 当前的内容，或当前导航到的内容 URI。

span.span: The URI for the current content, or the content that is currently being navigated to.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 请参阅 。See . > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri#initcap#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-urisharpinitcapsharpplural-md.md)] 可以是相对或绝对。 can be either relative or absolute. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [WPF 中的 Pack URI](~/docs/framework/wpf/app-development/pack-uris-in-wpf.md)。For more information, see [Pack URIs in WPF](~/docs/framework/wpf/app-development/pack-uris-in-wpf.md). ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何导航到[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)]通过设置属性。The following example shows how to navigate to a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] by setting the property. [!code-csharp[HOWTONavigationSnippets#NavigateToPageSrcCODE](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/HOWTONavigationSnippets/CSharp/MainWindow.xaml.cs#navigatetopagesrccode)] [!code-vb[HOWTONavigationSnippets#NavigateToPageSrcCODE](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/HOWTONavigationSnippets/visualbasic/mainwindow.xaml.vb#navigatetopagesrccode)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此成员是显式的接口成员实现。This member is an explicit interface member implementation. 它只能在 实例强制转换为 接口时使用。It can be used only when the instance is cast to an interface.
